gamecontrollerd(8) System Manager's Manual gamecontrollerd(8)

NAME

gamecontrollerd — game controller daemon

SYNOPSIS

gamecontrollerd

DESCRIPTION

gamecontrollerd arbitrates access to hardware game controllers amongst apps using the GameController framework.

There are no configuration options to gamecontrollerd . Users should not run gamecontrollerd manually.

FILES

~/Library/Preferences/com.apple.GameController.plist
User's game controller settings. Do not edit this file directly.

HISTORY

gamecontrollerd was first introduced in Mac OS X version 10.9 (Mavericks).

SEE ALSO

GameControllerConfigService(8)
